data.meta_description: VALIS | 1,873 followers on LinkedIn. Software for integration with recycling technology, utilizing artificial intelligence for maximum material recovery | VALIS builds AI-powered software that makes recycling more profitable, material supply chains more sustainable, and closes the loop on a circular economy for metal fabrication.
data.text:
Our next round of quarterly #EmpowHer grant recipients was just announced! Each grantee is a female founder starting a business and addressing social issues. They come from five states and are making a big impact. Help me congratulate the founders of Bake Me Healthy (NY), Baleena (Pennsylvania), Evie Co.(Colorado), RecycleReadRepeat Bookstore (Pennsylvania), VALIS Insights (Massachusetts) and VietFive (Illinois). #EmpowHer #BoundlessFutures #FemaleFounders https://bit.ly/4cRJCe7

"You can get a really pure, say, copper product, but we‚Äôre finding you can have 25%, 30% percent of that copper ending up in your leftover fraction. And that‚Äôs dollars being left on the plant floor." - Emily Molstad, CEO & Co-Founder, VALIS üë∑‚ôÄÔ∏è Emily Molstad dives into how she and her team take their passion for materials engineering to find tangible dollars hiding in clients' recycling byproducts utilizing technology to fine tune the existing operations. üë©üíª At #ISRI2024, Emily spared a few minutes to share about her unique background, how Valis was co-founded and what the team is working towards in the #recycledmaterials industry. üéô Ep. 31 Emily Molstad, Valis Insights Betts on the Future Podcast üéß Available on all major streaming platforms, Monday, June 24. Recycled Media Recycled Materials Association (ReMA)

Memo: Meet the 50 Industrial Transformation & Supply Chain Technology Startups REFASHIOND Ventures: The Industrial Transformation Fund has backed since September 2021 (#50StartupsIn50Days #REFASHIOND50) Startup: VALIS Count: 34 of 50 Brief Description: VALIS develops software tools for the metals recycling market. The company's products enable metals recyclers to maximize efficiency and output - by digitizing manual processes and automatically capturing data that previously required manual data capture with paper and pen. Investment Rationale: As demand for metals grows, geopolitics, political and social unrest, natural resource scarcity, and concerns about environmental sustainability are leading to increasingly frequent and unpredictable disruptions to external, international supply chains for virgin metals. This is leading to greater interest and investment in developing internal metals recycling supply chains and markets as a complement to international supply chains and markets for both virgin and recycled metals. #ObsessivelyEnthusiasticInvestor #UnreasonablyEnthusiasticInvestor We look for the people we believe are doing the best work in Industrial Transformation & Supply Chain Technology; Attempting the impossible. Then we go all-in on them. With OBSESSIVE and UNREASONABLE ENTHUSIASM. Our Investment Thesis: REFASHIOND Ventures: The Industrial Transformation Fund invests in early stage startups refashioning legacy industries through Data & AI, Advanced Materials, Advanced Manufacturing, & Next Generation Supply Chains; Defensible through economic moats. Join us. #IndustrialTransformation #SupplyChain #Innovation #Technology #Startups #VentureCapital #DemandTheImpossible #DataAndAI #NextGenerationSupplyChains #AdvancedMaterials
